jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
DESCRIPTION
Spirable is a VC-backed marketing technology startup that enables brands to use enriched customer data to create millions of personalised, contextually relevant videos that can be delivered via CRM and social media.

Three years in, we’re a Facebook Marketing Partner and already working with top international brands including Guinness, Domino's and Unilever. Due to a series of client wins, we’re looking for a bright Business Development Executive to help support and expand our Sales team. In the last 12 months we’ve tripled in size and we’re backed by experienced investors, so it’s a great time to join us!

View an example Guinness campaign video https://www.goo.gl/h2Ctbt

We're on an exciting journey here at Spirable - come be part of it!


What the role is...

Our non-hierarchical structure and startup culture means that you can have a direct impact on how we work and you'll be getting vast exposure across a variety of senior stakeholders, industries and environments, both over the phone and in person too.


What you'll be doing...

You will be provided with some inbound leads and also be required to generate your own leads, targeting senior marketing executives
You will conduct account mapping and research of accounts for the team
You will initially be helping the team to achieve its sales targets by generating meetings for the team by emailing and calling clients
You will represent Spirable at events and at networking opportunities to C-Level executives
You will build relations with clients and demonstrate our cutting edge software
You will be present pitches over the phone and on face-to-face meetings
You will coordinate the Sales pipeline with Client Services
Your initial target will be to generate meetings for the team for the first 6 months, if you achieve your target you will be promoted and given your own accounts and target with an uncapped commission


You...

Our team have become part of Spirable because they want to play a part in building an incredible product, and relish the idea of defining how things are done - because what we do has never been done before. You'll have this same passion and you'll want to build and develop as both of our journeys continue!


Your skills and experience...

You'll ideally have some commercial business development experience in the B2B space, ideally around retail at an agency or marketing startup. You could be an inbound Telesales Executive who's ready to step up, take on more responsibility, or new to Sales looking for a new challenge with a start-up with a fantastic offer that’s interesting to sell
You will absolutely love Tech! Are you unable to contain your excitement for new technology and bleeding edge applications? (Hopefully yes!) A positive attitude towards solving real world challenges would be great too
You'll be resourceful and be a self-starter, particularly around being able to find leads and working within a team environment and have entrepreneurial spirit
You'll be an excellent and confident communicator through email, f2f and over the phone
You'll be good with Microsoft Office, particularly being proficient with Excel, Word, and PowerPoint


BENEFITS
Spirable has just successfully closed another round of funding and is looking to grow rapidly across the business in the next 12 months. Alongside a competitive benefits package and opportunities for rapid career progression, we promote a culture with a healthy work/life balance and foster a community spirit with team lunches and evenings out. There's stock options on offer too, so as we continue to grow, you'll be an even bigger part of what we're doing.

Spirable is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace and welcomes applications from all candidates.


**Applicants must be available to work from Spirable’s office in central London and possess the required visa to work in the United Kingdom.**

jobs.title: Head of Sales
jobs.description:
Head of Sales

Salary: Competitive salary with share options depending on experience and commission on sales.

Spirable is the leading personalised video platform for the creation of smart, contextual video content for CRM and social media marketing. Spirable works with global brands to turn data into unique video content with each video tailored for one specific customer creating a more personalised and engaging experience. Spirable is an official Facebook Marketing Partner and has offices in the UK and US.  With recent funding, we're primed for growth. Getting in early, will help you grow as a person, during which you’ll learn about what it’s like to work for a high growth business whilst being able to carve a long term career for yourself.

Spirable is seeking a results-driven Sales Manager who is passionate about technology, relationships and business development. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing new business opportunities with some of the world’s biggest brands. The position is full-time and based in our London office.

Responsibilities:
Play a critical role in building, training and managing a talented, motivated, highly consultative sales team.
Build C-level and senior management relationships to help penetrate large organizations to develop video marketing solutions.
Exceed sales, pricing and yield goals.
Work seamlessly between sales channels and business functions to continue revenue growth.
Minimum Qualification:
4+ years of sales experience, digital or advertising industry is a plus
Marketing Industry knowledge and strong personal network
Passionate mind sight and drive for success
Strong analytical and strategic planning background
High public speaking and excellent pitching qualities
Excellent team player qualities
Ability to effectively operate with high energy and flexibility in a fast-paced, constantly evolving team environment
Ability to effectively influence and communicate cross-functionally
Ability to build relationships offering a consultative sale to clients and partners
Proven track record of reaching and exceeding sales revenue goals
BA/BS degree
Fluency in English

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in Brand Strategies, Brand Advertising and Media
Consulting sales experience a plus
MBA a plus
Additional languages

What Spirable can offer you:
A meritocracy where success is recognised and rewarded
Genuine career progression within a fast growing organisation
An energising environment where you’re the commander of your ship
The ability to participate in rapidly scaling the most exciting Communications Tech startup in london
The ability to help drive product development
The opportunity to work alongside a diverse group of people who love what they do
A company where everyone knows why they get out of bed in the morning
Uncapped commission where over performance is rewarded

jobs.title: Lead Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
DESCRIPTION

Spirable is a VC-backed marketing technology startup that enables brands to use enriched customer data to create millions of personalised, contextually relevant videos that can be delivered via CRM and social media.

Three years in, we’re a Facebook Marketing Partner and already working with top international brands including Guinness, Domino's and Unilever. As we continue to grow our customer base we are looking to expand our talented engineering team.

As a Lead Full Stack Developer at Spirable, you be will a hugely significant part of a team consisting of multiple PhDs that has worked in a variety of fast-paced environments from investment banking to Formula 1 aerodynamics.

We're creating some brilliant content for our customers. Check out the campaign we made for MADE - https://psvm.co/l/CjDdb8W0GM/

Also see how we're helping Manchester City F.C create a more personalised experience for their customers too! https://psvm.co/l/8x0A4mRO5x/

Check out our other case studies (https://www.spirable.com/case-studies) and our blog (https://www.spirable.com/personalised-video-blog)

We're on an exciting journey here at Spirable - come be part of it!

REQUIREMENTS

Responsibilities:

You'll be in charge of planning, managing and delivering updated product features in a fast-paced startup environment where things can change very quickly!
You will participate and have a key say in product development discussion and planning
Performing code review, testing and approval
This is very much an mature and self-starting environment, and you'll be carrying out complex tasks without being micro-managed. You will have to manage multiple complex and time-critical projects concurrently
You'll have a major contribution towards building a sustainable and scalable hardware and software architecture
We're self-starting but we work together so you'll be collaborating with the front-end team to build a world-class platform
We're not a big team at this point so you'll be required to muck in elsewhere, such as assisting with operations, monitoring and automation alongside developing new features
You'll be helping to build our engineering culture, so mentoring junior developers and promoting software development best practices will form a big part of that

Requirements:

You'll need to demonstrate a commercial software engineering background. Ideally you'll be a Python specialist but if you've got experience with other similar programming languages we'd still be interested in hearing from you
Proven experience with a web framework, e.g. Django / Flask or Rails
You'll be able to demonstrate an understanding of software design principles and development life cycle
Competency in writing unit tests and code review
It would be great if you have sound knowledge of modern front-end development, particularly HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript / jQuery / Angular, AJAX, REST APIs and JSON
Proficient with Unix command line tools and comfortable writing shell scripts
Any experience you have deploying to, provisioning and managing cloud-based environments and containers will be a plus
We're a small but growing and very collaborative team so excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, as well as the capability to reach out to both technical and non-technical audiences are very useful!
We need you to have a positive attitude and be passionate about building something great; you'll be happy to, and be encouraged to, take the initiative when necessary

BENEFITS

Spirable has just successfully closed another round of funding and is looking to grow rapidly across the business in the next 12 months. Alongside a competitive benefits package and opportunities for career progression, we promote a culture with a healthy work/life balance. There's stock options on offer too, so as we continue to grow, you'll be an even bigger part of what we're doing.

Spirable is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace and welcomes applications from all candidates.

Applicants must be available to work from Spirable’s office in central London and possess the required visa to work in the United Kingdom.


Message to Recruitment Agencies - Don't call us, we'll call you. Cheers.

jobs.title: Senior Front End Developer
jobs.description:
DESCRIPTION

Spirable is a VC-backed marketing technology startup that enables brands to use enriched customer data to create millions of personalised, contextually relevant videos that can be delivered via CRM and social media.

Three years in, we’re a Facebook Marketing Partner and already working with top international brands including Guinness, Domino's and Unilver. As we continue to grow our customer base we are looking to expand our talented engineering team.

As a Senior Front End Developer at Spirable, you be will a hugely significant part of a team consisting of multiple PhDs that has worked in a variety of fast-paced environments from investment banking to Formula 1 aerodynamics.

We're creating some brilliant content for our customers. Check out the campaign we made for MADE - https://psvm.co/l/CjDdb8W0GM/

Also see how we're helping Manchester City F.C create a more personalised experience for their customers too! https://psvm.co/l/8x0A4mRO5x/

Check out our other case studies (https://www.spirable.com/case-studies) and our blog (https://www.spirable.com/personalised-video-blog)

We're on an exciting journey here at Spirable - come be part of it!

REQUIREMENTS

Responsibilities
You'll be in charge of designing, building and managing the best in class UI system to complement our backend technologies in a fast-paced startup environment - things can change very quickly!
You will participate in and have a big say product development discussion and planning
Performing code review, testing and approval
We're hoping it won't be for long, but we're currently a small team so you'll need to collaborate with the back-end team to build a comprehensive self-serve platform
This is very much an mature and self-starting environment, and you'll be carrying out complex tasks without being micro-managed. You will have to manage multiple complex and time-critical projects concurrently
You'll have a major contribution towards building a sustainable and scalable hardware and software architecture
You will get your hands dirty across different tech ares, such as assisting with operations, monitoring and automation alongside developing new features
You'll be helping to build our engineering culture, so mentoring junior developers and promoting software development best practices will form a big part of that

Requirements 
You'll need a solid commercial background in software development using JavaScript, including modern frameworks like jQuery, Angular, React, Vue, etc.
A deep knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, AJAX, REST APIs, JSON will be very helpful too!
You'll be able to demonstrate an understanding of software design principles and development life cycle
Competency in writing unit tests and code review
Proficient with Unix command line tools and comfortable writing shell scripts
Any experience you have deploying to, provisioning and managing cloud-based environments and containers will be a plus
We're a small but growing and very collaborative team so excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, as well as the capability to reach out to both technical and non-technical audiences are very useful!
We need you to have a positive attitude and be passionate about building something great; you'll be happy to, and be encouraged to, take the initiative when necessary
You'll be working closely with our creative design team too, so any knowledge of Photoshop or related would be a massive plus in terms of working together cohesively

BENEFITS

Spirable has just successfully closed another round of funding and is looking to grow rapidly across the business in the next 12 months. Alongside a competitive benefits package and opportunities for career progression, we promote a culture with a healthy work/life balance. There's stock options on offer too, so as we continue to grow, you'll be an even bigger part of what we're doing.

Spirable is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace and welcomes applications from all candidates.

Applicants must be available to work from Spirable’s office in central London and possess the required visa to work in the United Kingdom.



Message to Recruitment Agencies - Don't call us, we'll call you. Cheers.
